channel.title: Huge memory problem
channel.description:
Ok, I have this huge problem with a server I'm hosting.
When I start up the server, it uses about 30mb ram. So far so good. But after a few seconds, the usage jumps up to 80mb, and a few seconds later it's well over 100mb and rising. The highest I've seen it so far was 300mb, with just 2 people on. But, I've also had it on for hours with 15+ people and it would just use 50-90mb.
What could be the cause of this? This problem only started to show earlier today, and has been happening ever since. I can't even run the server for more then 5 minutes before it uses a heckload of ram now.
I didn't change anything about the server in days, so I'm sure it's not because of something new I added.
What the hell can be the problem, this is driving me mad ._.

item.title: Huge memory problem
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

To be completely honest with you, you should probably just switch to a different server base that doesn’t eating up your RAM. Try out Hyperion or a server with thread-per-client removed.

Read full topic
